name: Meat Space
description:
This simulation comments on the meaningful life we all live, the meat which represents the human race and our unity in the universe.  The fragility of the planet and the rather homoerotic phrase "Meat Space" had inspired me to make this simulation.

Controls:

w= back

a= left

s= right

d= forward

r= up

f= down

[space]= spin

[up arrow] = rotate up

[left arrow]= rotate left

[right arrow]= rotate right

[down arrow]= rotate down
